document_name: LECB Project Document - Philippines (Final) pending signature 16April2012.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The Philippines is one of 15 phase 1 countries participating in a collaborative Programme focused on capacity building for climate change over a four-year period. The Overall Programme will strengthen national capacities to do the following: 1) Develop/establish greenhouse gas inventory management systems; 2) Formulate Nationally Appropriate Mitigation Actions (NAMAs) and/or low-emission development strategies (LEDS) in the context of national development; 3) Design MRV systems to support implementation and evaluation of NAMAs and LEDS and 4) Facilitate the design and adoption of mitigation actions by selected industries in a few countries; and 5) Support the design of the associated MRV systems for industrial mitigation measures. The Philippines will focus on outcomes 1 to 3.

project_descr: Philippines' Context-Assessment for the Preparation of the National Climate Change Capacity Building Programme Proposal
project_title: Philippines: Low Emission Capacity Building Project
